note: 3rd rate dad (I may be overestimating) hobbies include: carb loading for the apocalypse, trying to find time for hobbies, sleep deprivation still not sure what these social medeas are all about.  Header - inside of the Stanley Cup. The 1907 championships were played in Winnipeg between the Montreal Wanderers and the Kelowna Thistles. Montreal won, the cup went to Montreal, was stolen and ransomed. No one paid the ransom, the cup was returned, and used as a geranium planter until the next season.
